name: fundamental-ngx
description: SAP Fundamental Styles, implemented in Angular

scripts.build-all: npm run build-artifacts && npm run build-docs -- --prod --base-href="/fundamental-ngx/"
scripts.build-docs-netlify: npm run build-artifacts && npm run build-docs -- --configuration="production-unoptimized" --base-href="/"
scripts.build-docs: npm run compile-typedoc-all && npm run copy-docs && ng build
scripts.build-artifacts: ng build core && ng build platform && ng build docs
scripts.build-deploy-library: ng build core && ng build platform && npm run build:schematics && npm run sync-versions && cp PLATFORM_README.md dist/libs/platform/PLATFORM_README.md
scripts.build-pack-library: ng build core && ng build platform && npm run build:schematics && npm run sync-versions && cd dist/libs/core/ && npm pack && cd ../platform && npm pack && cd ../..
scripts.copy-docs: cp README.md apps/docs/src/assets/README.md && cp NEW_COMPONENT.md apps/docs/src/assets/NEW_COMPONENT.md && cp NEW_PLATFORM_COMPONENT.md apps/docs/src/assets/NEW_PLATFORM_COMPONENT.md && npm run copy-app-docs
scripts.copy-app-docs: cp libs/core/README.md apps/docs/src/assets/CORE_README.md && cp PLATFORM_README.md apps/docs/src/assets/PLATFORM_README.md
scripts.lint: ng lint docs && ng lint core && ng lint platform
scripts.lint:pre-commit:
printf "running pre-commit lint..."  && npm run lint && printf "done!
"
scripts.compile-typedoc-all: npm run compile-typedoc-core && npm run compile-typedoc-platform
scripts.compile-typedoc-core: rm -rf apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/core && typedoc --out apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/core libs/core/src/lib --module commonjs --mode file --exclude **/*.spec.ts --hideGenerator --excludePrivate --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc
scripts.compile-typedoc-platform: rm -rf apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/platform && typedoc --out apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/platform libs/platform/src/lib --module commonjs --mode file --exclude **/*.spec.ts --hideGenerator --excludePrivate --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc
scripts.compile-typedoc-json: typedoc --json apps/docs/src/assets/typedoc/typedoc.json --module commonjs --mode file --exclude **/*.spec.ts --hideGenerator --excludePrivate --theme apps/docs/src/fd-typedoc libs/core/src/lib
scripts.build:schematics: ./node_modules/.bin/tsc -p libs/core/tsconfig.schematics.json && npm run copy:schemas && npm run copy:collection
